admin.title: User Management
admin.subtitle: Manage all users, roles, and permissions
admin.confirmRemoveOwnAdmin: Are you sure you want to remove your own admin access? You will not be able to access this page anymore.
admin.confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.
admin.confirmBulkDelete: Delete {count} users? This cannot be undone.
admin.ownAdminRemoved: Your admin access has been removed.

explore.title: Explore Public Inventories
explore.description: This page will show all public inventories from all users.
explore.comingSoon: Coming soon in Phase 8-10 when we build the public inventory features!

footer.description: Modern inventory management system with custom fields and access control.
footer.copyright: Inventory Management System. Built with Next.js & Prisma.

customFields.title: Custom Fields
customFields.description: Define your own fields for each inventory. Add text, numbers, checkboxes, and more.

accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.description: Control who can view and edit your inventories. Public or private, your choice.

smartTags.title: Smart Tags
smartTags.description: Organize with tags and find items instantly with full-text search.

customIds.title: Custom IDs
customIds.description: Generate unique IDs with your own format using text, numbers, dates, and sequences.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Comment on items, like entries, and collaborate with your team in real-time.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: View analytics and statistics for your inventories with aggregated data.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users managing their inventories efficiently

customFieldsBuilder.title: Custom Fields
customFieldsBuilder.description: Add up to 3 custom fields of each type to your inventory. These fields will be available when creating items.
customFieldsBuilder.noFieldsYet: No custom fields added yet. Click the buttons above to add fields.

edit.title: Edit Inventory
edit.subtitle: Update your inventory details and custom fields
